Title: Groovy: Arbitrary code execution
Synopsis:
A vulnerability within serialization might allow remote attackers
    to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: A multi-faceted language for the Java platform

Description.Text: It was discovered that there was a vulnerability within the Java serialization/deserialization process.

Impact.Text: An attacker, by crafting a special serialized object, could execute arbitrary code.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
Gentoo has discontinued support for Groovy. We recommend that users
      unmerge Groovy:
